channel.title: Server is still offline after portfarwarding and running?
channel.description: I got no-ip/ i portforwarded/ i ran/ but when i checked on runelocus it said offline any ideas?

item.title: Server is still offline after portfarwarding and running?
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

open utorrent, go to options>preferences>connecton

there should be a spot for a port.
use port 43594

save settings, run no-ip and server. see if it connects…
post what happens

Read full topic
item.source: Server is still offline after portfarwarding and running?

item.title: Server is still offline after portfarwarding and running?
item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

[quote=“Siccc, post:4, topic:308452”]This solution has worked for… Everyone I have told it to…

Step 1: Go to your router(s)
Step 2: Locate the reset button on them (All of them if you have 2)
Step 3: Push the reset button them both
Step 4: Portfoward 43594 Port (Or what ever port you need)
Step 5: Run your server =]

Rep if helped Thanks![/quote]
wow desperate on the rep? if u didnt notice he cant even rep lmfao…

Read full topic

item.title: Server is still offline after portfarwarding and running?

@Siccc wrote:

This solution has worked for… Everyone I have told it to…

Step 1: Go to your router(s)
Step 2: Locate the reset button on them (All of them if you have 2)
Step 3: Push the reset button them both
Step 4: Portfoward 43594 Port (Or what ever port you need)
Step 5: Run your server =]

Rep if helped Thanks!
